org.sd.cluster.job
Class DirectoryBatchMaker

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.DirectoryBatchMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
BatchMaker
public class DirectoryBatchMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements BatchMaker

A batch maker that creates a string unit of work that is the path to each (deep) directory contained under a path.

Author:
Spence Koehler
